subject: Re: [junit] Re: ANT and JUNIT Integration Problem
msgSnippet: A quick comment on the buildfile. Who s reading these comments? I m struck by the comment that says This is the default target. Doesn t the default attribute
messageBody:
A quick comment on the buildfile. Who's reading these comments? I'm
struck by the comment that says "This is the default target." Doesn't
the default attribute of the <project> tag already say that?

Use comments to explain why you wrote the buildfile that way; don't use
comments to explain how to read it. Point to the Ant manual instead.

Just an opinion. I'm reading the buildfile now for the problem you
described.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
